creator: Louisa May Alcott
description:
LibriVox recording of Aunt Jo's Scrap-Bag Vol. 6 by Louisa May Alcott.
Read in English by Gloria Begemann; S R Colon; Rachel; Kathleen Moore; jaya; JudyDerby; Jennifer Duval

Aunt Jo's Scrap-Bag is now full. This, the last volume, is another book of short stories, including An Old-Fashioned ThanksgivingShadow-Children, The Whale's Story, and eight more charming stories for all ages, written by Louisa May Alcott, author of Little Women and Eight Cousins. The series is not about any characters from the Little Women books - doubtless the publisher relied on the popularity of that series to sell this one.

Aunt Jo's Scrap-Bag
Shawl-Straps: A Second Series of Aunt Jo's Scrap-Bag
Aunt Jo's Scrap-Bag Vol. 3
Aunt Jo's Scrap-Bag Vol. 4
Aunt Jo's Scrap-Bag Vol. 5
Aunt Jo's Scrap-Bag Vol. 6
- Summary by Summary by Rachel
For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks;children; animals; family; thanksgiving; kids stories; louisa m. alcott; children's short works
title: Aunt Jo's Scrap-Bag Vol. 6
